review: I was quite dissapointed with this product. The organization in the screen is quite confusing and messy, the tutorials make no sense.  Most of the time i had to use my kidle (which i love) as a remote control, quite annoying.  Also the stick has to be attached to a power source the cable just looks tacky unlike the commercial were it looks wireless.  I am getting a refund but i have to pay for shipping.  Honestly the apple tv is much better and its like $10 more.  Yes you wont be able to watch videos from Amazon Prime but im able to watxh any video from my computer (i just stream it through the apple tv)  sorry but this was just not for me

review: Up until my fire tv stick arrived I had been using an apple tv. After using the fire tv for less than a day I can safely say I will never be using the apple tv again. Not only can it do everything the apple tv can and more but it is less than half the price.  I am now considering getting a further 2 more for the other tv's in the house.
